question: Trees need oxygen. Roots close to the surface of the ground take in the oxygen the tree needs. Which organisms help trees get oxygen?
candidate_answers: (A) woodpeckers making holes in the tree (B) earthworms making holes in the ground near the tree (C) mushrooms growing at the base of the tree (D) squirrels eating walnuts on the ground near the tree
answer: squirrels eating walnuts on the ground near the tree
label: D
